name: STAR WARS: THE PHANTOM MENACE
context: After a millennia, an ancient evil returns seeking revenge. Meanwhile, Jedi Knight Qui-Gon Jinn discovers Anakin Skywalker: a young slave boy unusually strong with the Force.

name: STAR WARS: ATTACK OF THE CLONES
context: Following an assassination attempt on Senator Padm√© Amidala, Jedi Knights Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi investigate a mysterious plot that could change the galaxy forever.

name: STAR WARS: THE PHANTOM MENACE
context: Thirty years after the Battle of Endor, a new threat has risen in the form of the First Order and the villainous Kylo Ren. Meanwhile, Rey, a young scavenger, discovers powers that will change her life -- and possibly save the galaxy.
